sentences.en: A quill pen on writing paper demands care, attention to grammar, tidiness, controlled thinking.
sentences.cn: 用羽毛笔在写字纸上书写要求你小心翼翼、注意语法、整洁、克制思考。

sentences.en: Employees are expected to maintain a high standard of tidiness in their dress and appearance.
sentences.cn: 员工们要保持着装和仪表高度整洁。

sentences.en: He preferred the cleanness and tidiness of the wild sod.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢荒野草地的清洁和整齐.

sentences.en: I'm afraid tidiness is not his strong point , ie he is untidy.
sentences.cn: 我看他这个人不大讲究整洁.

sentences.en: I'm very impressed by your tidiness and order.
sentences.cn: 你的整洁、有条理给我留下了很深的印象。

sentences.en: Inspect beverage section areas daily to improve cleanliness and tidiness.
sentences.cn: 经常检查酒水部区域,达至更佳清洁整齐.

sentences.en: It can keep the goods tidiness when you go out or travel.
sentences.cn: 外出或旅行时能让携带的物品保持整洁.

sentences.en: Maintain cleanliness tidiness in the tools room at all times.

sentences.en: Maintain tidiness, cleanliness , and peacefulness within and around the home stay facility.

sentences.en: Manage the cleanliness , tidiness, storage conditions, security and safety of the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 负责仓库的保密 、 安全 、 保证清洁卫生的仓储环境.

sentences.en: Our parents teach us personal tidiness.
sentences.cn: 我们的父母教育我们注意打扮整洁.

sentences.en: Students should follow the teacher's instructions, and maintain class order and tidiness.
sentences.cn: 上课时请遵从老师的指导, 并共同维护上课秩序及教室整洁.

sentences.en: The search for a new definition derives from more than mere tidiness.
sentences.cn: 寻找新的定义不仅仅是要梳理脉络.

sentences.en: Tidiness in the workshop is really essential for producing good work.
sentences.cn: 车间的整洁是生产出好产品的基本条件.

sentences.en: Tidiness means that everything is in its proper place.
sentences.cn: 保持整洁的意思是,把各种物件放在适当的地方.
